Common email flows for eCommerce Industry

Abandoned Checkout

Use this ecommerce abandoned checkout email flow to remind visitors that they haven't finished the checkout process and get them to complete the purchase.

Welcome Series

Use this ecommerce welcome email flow to introduce your brand to new subscribers, engage with them, and guide them down the funnel to make a purchase.

Abandoned Cart

Use the abandoned cart email flow sequence to remind people about the items they have abandoned and get them to finish the purchase.

Feedback

Use this ecommerce feedback email flow sequence to get feedback on your brand and product to improve and enrich the customer experience.

Product Recommendation

Use this ecommerce product recommendation email flow sequence to lure customers to your shop’s website or app and get them to make a purchase.

Idle Win-Back

Use this ecommerce re-engagement email flow sequence to re-engage inactive customers and get them to make a purchase or repeat purchase.

Product Refill

Use this ecommerce replenishment email flow sequence to increase customer retention by getting people to make a repeat transaction.

Browse Abandonment

Use this ecommerce browse abandonment email flow sequence to remind people about products they were interested in and urge them to make a purchase.

Upsell/Cross-Sell

Use this ecommerce upsell and cross-sell email flow sequence to get people to buy more products or more expensive products from your brand.

Milestone

Use this e-commerce milestone email flow to celebrate milestones, like anniversaries or birthdays, with your customers and get them to make a purchase.

New Arrivals

Use this ecommerce new arrivals email sequence to introduce new arrivals or product launches to your customers or leads and get them to make a purchase.

Order Confirmation

Use this ecommerce order confirmation email flow to reassure customers that you have received their order and send them updates on shipping and delivery.

Back-in-Stock

Use this ecommerce back-in-stock email sequence to inform your customers the product that they wanted has been restocked and get them to make a purchase.

Price Drop Email

Use the price drop email sequence to inform customers and leads about the sale/price drop and get them to make a purchase.

Post Purchase

Enhance customer loyalty and satisfaction with post-purchase email sequences on order confirmation, shipping updates, reviews, tips, and exclusive offers.

Frequently asked questions

Interactive AMP emails reduce friction in the conversion process by bringing a website-like experience within the email. As a result, users can add items to their cart, play games like polls, or spin the wheel to unlock rewards and get a real-time view of your products without leaving their inbox.
Learn more about different use cases of AMP emails to boost conversions

Mailmodo is the best ecommerce email marketing software as you can create drag-and-drop visual journey builders, add dynamic blocks to send real-time updates, and make email interactive by adding carts, carousel spin the wheels and create an amazing customer experience.

Here are some of the emails you can send to your customers:
• Welcome email to tell your brand story or showcase your products,
• Product recommendation emails to generate sales,
• Abandoned cart emails to target customers who didn’t complete the purchase,
• Win-back email offering special coupons or discount
• Transactional emails such as order confirmation, product delivery update
• Promotional or holiday emails
Learn more about e-commerce email marketing

Yes, using our email automation feature, you can create different types of email drip sequences such as win-back email sequences, upsell email sequences, abandoned cart email sequences, and make it more targeted by adding conditions, delays in the series.
